item.title: Common commands
item.description: Redis common commands # Database # DBSIZE # DBSIZE Return the number of keys in the currently-selected database. see also https://redis.io/commands/dbsize/ FLUSHALL # FLUSHALL [ASYNC | SYNC] Remove all keys from all database. see also https://redis.io/commands/flushall/ FLUSHDB # FLUSHDB [ASYNC | SYNC] Remove all keys from the current database. see also https://redis.io/commands/flushdb/ SELECT # SELECT index Change the selected database for the current connection. see also https://redis.io/commands/select/ KEY # KEYS # KEYS pattern Returns all keys matchingÂ pattern.
